{"blocks":[{"key":"7inm0","text":"Raise and house marmosets in compliance with your local Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) and ensure that all protocols and procedures have been approved by the appropriate ethical and regulatory committees. {"blocks":[{"key":"63cp8","text":"At four weeks post-injection, euthanize marmosets and perfuse with 1X phosphate buffered saline.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bcgg4","text":"Flash freeze tissue (e.g. using 2-methylbutane chilled with dry ice). Separate the brain into coronal blocks and flash freeze the blocks. Store tissue at -80 ºC until ready for processing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
